---
title: Make Hooks
description: Create a custom hook for managing reusable logic in React components.
---

## Command
Follow this command to create a new hook.
```plaintext
lukio make:hook
```

## Available
This command is available for:
- Fullstack nextjs
- Frontend nextjs

## Example
```plaintext
lukio make:hook
Enter your hook name: hello
```

## Output
File will be created in `src/hook/use_hello.ts`
```plaintext
/**
 * @author lukio-cli
 * @generated at 2000-01-01 00:00:00
 * This file is generated by lukio CLI
 */

const useHello = () => {
    return null 
};

export default useHello;
```
